channel.title: Character Design Screen in Wrench Tab?
channel.description:
Ok, this is pissing me off. Inside the wrench tab, there's another screen, like, overlapping it. Please help, i need this client to work.
And PLEASE try to stay away from "it's a client-sided problem." I KNOW that, i need to know how to FIX it.
Picture:
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/k4glde.jpg[/img]
Thanks, Damon
